programmes.show_description: Crime thriller with Sylvester Stallone. After suffering a brain injury, the only surviving thief from a bank heist is given an experimental drug to rebuild his memory and help crack the case. (2018)
Vigilante thriller with Alien's Tom Skerritt. Tired of the crime in his neighbourhood, a deli owner takes matters into his own hands and forms a civilian patrol to keep the streets clean. (1982)
Action adventure. British inspector Harry Sanders investigates diamond and gold fraud in Africa, uncovering a plot involving smugglers raiding a sunken ship. (1964)
